com.thomsonreuters.upa.examples.common

Class ProviderLoginHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.thomsonreuters.upa.examples.common.ProviderLoginHandler

  • public class ProviderLoginHandler
extends java.lang.Object
    This is the implementation of processing of login requests and login status messages.

    Only one login stream per channel is allowed by this simple provider.

        public int processRequest(com.thomsonreuters.upa.transport.Channel chnl,
                          com.thomsonreuters.upa.codec.Msg msg,
                          com.thomsonreuters.upa.codec.DecodeIterator dIter,
                          com.thomsonreuters.upa.transport.Error error)
        Processes a login request.
        Parameters:
        chnl - - The channel of the request
        msg - - The partially decoded message
        dIter - - The decode iterator
        error - - Error information in case of failure
        Returns:
        returns success if decoding of request message and sending of response message succeeds or failure if it fails.

      • sendCloseStatus

        public int sendCloseStatus(com.thomsonreuters.upa.transport.Channel chnl,
                           com.thomsonreuters.upa.transport.Error error)
        Sends the login close status message for a channel.
        Parameters:
        chnl - - The channel to send close status message to
        error - - Error information in case of failure
        Returns:
        CodecReturnCodes.SUCCESS if close status message sent successfully, < CodecReturnCodes.SUCCESS when it fails.
